carpet.rule.broadcastToAll.desc: Broadcasts all OP messages to everyone
carpet.rule.cakeAlwaysEat.desc: Allows you to always eat cake, even when you are not hungry
carpet.rule.cameraModeRestoreLocation.de: Restores player location back to original location in survival, similar to the cs script by Kdender
carpet.rule.cameraModeRestoreLocation.ex: Saves location even after server restart
carpet.rule.cameraModeSurvivalRestrictio: Ports cameraModeSurvivalRestrictions from carpet 1.12 into commandCameraMode
Does not allow you to use camera mode if you are in danger
carpet.rule.cameraModeTeamTeleportBlackl: Prevents players from teleporting to players on specific teams in spectator
Prevents players from teleporting to players in spectator
carpet.rule.commandBackup.desc: Allows you to backup regions in an area to the backups folder in the world folder
carpet.rule.commandCameraMode.desc: Survival friendly spectator mode, puts the player in and out of spectator mode. By default the command is `/cs`
carpet.rule.commandCameraMode.extra.0: Allows for saving location after server reset using rule cameraModeRestoreLocation and adds functionality for cameraModeSurvivalRestrictions
carpet.rule.commandDefuse.desc: Enables `/defuse` to be used to stop any tnt from exploding within a given range
carpet.rule.commandDimensions.desc: Allows the player to teleport to different dimensions with a simple command
carpet.rule.commandDimensions.extra.0: It will teleport you to specified location, unless unspecified in which case it will teleport you to 0,0
carpet.rule.commandEnderChest.desc: Allows you to open your enderchest with `/enderchest`
carpet.rule.commandExtinguish.desc: Allows `/extinguish` to be used to extinguish the player
carpet.rule.commandFly.desc: Toggles the ability to fly while in survival mode using `/fly`
carpet.rule.commandFly.extra.0: Using this also disables fall damage
carpet.rule.commandGod.extra.0: Can be buggy if used while in creative mode
carpet.rule.commandHat.desc: Allows you to equip items to your head slot using `/hat`
carpet.rule.commandHeal.desc: Allows `/heal` to be used to heal and feed the player
carpet.rule.commandLagSpike.desc: Allows you to simulate a lag spike using `/lagspike`
carpet.rule.commandMods.desc: Allows you to do `/mods`, it lists all the mods running on the server
carpet.rule.commandMore.desc: Allows `/more` to be used to give a full stack of whatever item the player is holding
carpet.rule.commandGhostPlayer.desc: This allows you to spawn a fake player that doesn't load chunks (They appear on tab list and you are able to teleport to them)
carpet.rule.commandPublicKick.desc: Allows anyone to use the `/kick` command
carpet.rule.commandPublicOp.desc: Allows anyone to use the `/op` command
carpet.rule.commandPublicSaveAll.desc: Allows all players to use the command `/save-all`
carpet.rule.commandPublicScoreboard.desc: Allows anyone to use the `/scoreboard` command
carpet.rule.commandPublicTeam.desc: Allows anyone to use the `/team` command
carpet.rule.commandPublicViewDistance.de: Allows all players to change view distance
carpet.rule.commandRename.desc: Allows you to rename items with a command
carpet.rule.commandRepair.desc: Allows `/repair` to be used to repair any item the player is holding
carpet.rule.commandSwitchDimensions.desc: Allows the player to teleport between the nether and overworld at equivalent coords
carpet.rule.commandTop.desc: Teleports the player up using the `/top` command
carpet.rule.commandWarp.desc: Allows players to warp using `/setwarp` and `/warp`
carpet.rule.commandWorkbench.desc: Allows you to open a crafting table with `/workbench`
carpet.rule.editableSigns.desc: Allows you to edit a sign after it has been placed by right clicking it while sneaking
carpet.rule.essentialCarefulBreak.desc: Mining blocks while crouching will put mined blocks straight into your inventory, requires players to subscribe to careful break using `/subscribe essential_careful_break
Same as wholmT's implementation in carpetAddons but works with stackable shulkers`
carpet.rule.essentialCarefulDrop.desc: Killing mobs while crouching will put dropped items straight into your inventory, requires players to subscribe to careful drop using `/subscribe essential_careful_drop`
carpet.rule.fakePlayerDropInventoryOnKil: Automatically drop the fake player inventory on kill
carpet.rule.gameRuleNonOp.desc: Allows non-op players to change Game Rules from the client
carpet.rule.gameRuleSync.desc: Syncs the Game Rules with the client
carpet.rule.gameRuleSync.extra.0: Essential Client is required to change the rules on the client
carpet.rule.infiniteItems.desc: This allows for survival players to have infinite blocks, food, and enderpearls
carpet.rule.maxChatLength.desc: Changes the max chat length limit, you need EssentialClient for this to work, setting this rule below 256 may cause issues
carpet.rule.phantomsObeyMobcaps.desc: Makes phantoms unable to spawn unless the mobcap allows for them to
carpet.rule.reloadFakePlayerActions.desc: Automatically reloads the fake players actions after server restart
carpet.rule.reloadFakePlayers.desc: Automatically respawns fake players on server restart
carpet.rule.removeItemEntitiesAfterThres: Removes all item entities after set amount of item entities is reached in a world, set to 0 to disable
carpet.rule.removeWarnOversizedChunk.des: Removes the warning 'Saving oversized chunk...' in console and logs
carpet.rule.removeWarnMismatchBlockPos.d: Removes the warning 'Mismatch in destroy block pos...' in console and logs
carpet.rule.removeWarnRemovedEntity.desc: Removes the warning 'Fetching packet for removed entity...' in console and logs
carpet.rule.removeXpEntitiesAfterThresho: Removes all xp entities after set amount of xp entities is reached in a world, set to 0 to disable
carpet.rule.shulkerSception.desc: Allows you to put shulker boxes inside of other shulkers
carpet.rule.spectatorPotionNoCountdown.d: Stops potion effects from ticking when in spectator
carpet.rule.stackableShulkersInPlayerInv: Shulker boxes stack in player inventories, this is not the same as `stackableShulkerBoxes` in Carpet. This will always allow you to stack shulkers in your inventory.
Disable all other `stackableShulker` rules (unless you are using stackableShulkersWithItems)
carpet.rule.stackableShulkersWithItems.d: Shulker boxes stack with items inside will stack with other shulkers with the same items
carpet.rule.stackableShulkersWithItems.e: This rule requires stackableShulkersInPlayerInventories to be enabled
carpet.rule.structureBlockKillEntities.d: Kills all entities (bar players) within the structure bounding box when loading a structure
carpet.rule.structureBlockKillEntities.e: Requires ignore entities to be set to false
Replaces existing fluids when pasting. Why would you want to keep existing fluids anyways???
